title: The Great Pumpkin Migration
story: Off in the distance, bright orange flashes bob into view as the air begins to chill and the leaves begin to fall. Thus begins the Great Pumpkin Migration, thousands of pumpkins waiting to drift into the arms of their new homes.

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 7.1 x 7.1 inches or 18.1 x 18.1 cm on 14 count aida
